A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: All I have to say is that Rian Johnson is a god among men who literally did what I thought no one could. I was beyond pleasantly surprised last night; I was thrilled\, captivated and smiling like a buffoon through every single set up\, revelation and character development. Hats off to an amazing cast\, with a phenomenal script. This is storytelling at its finest.
